segments.text: United Nations in Geneva and President, Relator of the Working Group for the presentation of the report.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segments.text: Excellency, dear Ambassador, you have the floor.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_02

segments.text: Thank you, Chairperson, Excellencies, Ladies and Gentlemen.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: I'm pleased to introduce the report of the 19th session
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: on the Effective Implementation of the Durban Declaration
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00
